Paul's Journal

mod_auth project and what is open source for me.

I have setup a new SourceForge Project for Authentication Modules

Lots of little changes to mod_authn_dbi have happend in the last few days. One thing I have been working on was moving it to autoconf/automake and family. Well, I am now more resolved than ever in my hate for those projects and my love for SCons.

Been getting alot of help from Axel Grossklaus. Its been a cool feeling to have someone external to my project helping out. I think this is the first time I have had someone I didn’t have a previous relationship with help me on a project. That is why I love open source software. Anyone, Anywhere can help, and it makes me feel all warm and fuzzy on the inside.
